data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Ogooué-Maritime to agree with you and with one another.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ogooué-Maritime, Gabon
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Ogooué-Maritime, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, help the 16,089 believers in Ogooué-Maritime to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Ogooué-Maritime, Gabon to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Bandoumu, Minduumo people. 0.5% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Ogooué-Maritime, Gabon, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 16,089 believers in Ogooué-Maritime to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Ogooué-Maritime, Gabon.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Ogooué-Maritime
location.people_groups_list: Simba, Ndambomo, Okande, Kande, Arab, Wolof
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Simba (200), Ndambomo (1,300), Okande, Kande (900), Arab (5,200), Wolof (13,000)
